SYSTEM: OWS_-_06_-_Lifecycle-selection.pdf: Página 19
NeOn Lifecycle Models
©Asunción Gómez-Pérez, Carmen Suarez-Figueroa
Life Cycle Models and Life Cycles
•
An ontology life cycle model is the framework (waterfall, evolving 
prototyping, spiral, etc.), selected by each using organization, on which 
to map the activities identified in the ontology development process.
•
The ontology life cycle is the specific sequence of activities that the 
ontology practitioners carry out for developing an ontology.
speaker: SYSTEM
